raw_comment: I noticed that the NBA and the WNBA has the highest percent of black people. I wonder why Baseball has the lowest amount. I thought that it would be higher because of the famous black people who where in the sport. Why are all of the graphs in 2020 except the Women's National Basketball Association that one is in 2019.
ace_sentences: I noticed that the NBA has the highest percent of black people.
I noticed that the WNBA has the highest percent of black people.
Baseball has the lowest percent of black people.
I wonder why Baseball has the lowest percent of black people.
I thought that the percent of black people in Baseball would be higher.
Some famous black people were in Baseball.
The graph for the Women's National Basketball Association is in 2019.
I wonder why the graph for the Women's National Basketball Association is in 2019.
